title: 美國田納西州一名女子，早前申請駕駛執照續期，上周郵寄取證時就發現，自己的證件相竟變成吉凳？！

replies.msg:

“I used to be with my Mother and we had been going to devour lunch and I stated, ‘You want to look this, this is not proper,'” Jade Dodd instructed CNN associate WKRN.
Dodd had lately renewed her license in Hickman County and when it got here within the mail on Thursday, she used to be stunned to seek out that rather than her image ID there used to be a photograph of an empty chair.

“The girl on the DMV didn’t in point of fact imagine me when I used to be like ‘good day, I want my license mounted,'” Dodd stated.

“Then, she appeared it up within the gadget and is going, ‘Oh, I want my supervisor for this.'”

The Tennessee Division of Protection and Native land Safety instructed CNN the mistake came about when the incorrect symbol used to be captured and stored to Dodd’s profile.

“When the buyer lately renewed her driving force license on-line, she won a picture of a chair as a result of that used to be the remaining image taken on document,” Wes Moster, director of communications, stated in a observation.

“When the Division used to be made acutely aware of her state of affairs, we in an instant made issues proper with the buyer and supplied her with a license along with her precise picture and feature addressed this example internally.”

Happily, Dodd most commonly simply thinks it is hilarious and instructed WKRN that it used to be a great way to lighten the temper because of the coronavirus.

“My boss thinks it is funnier than any individual. I used to be at paintings Friday and he pointed to a chair outdoor of his place of work door and used to be like, ‘I believed this used to be you, I waved at it this morning’ and I used to be like ‘thank you,'” stated Dodd.
